name: 02-Dataset Definition and Preparation
content:
Data Description

The dataset captures on-shelf availability metrics at a daily granularity across stores and SKUs.

Key Attributes:

  • date (temporal, daily granularity) – Transaction/recording date.
  • store_id (categorical) – Identifier of the retail store.
  • sku (categorical) – Identifier of the product SKU.
  • product_category (categorical) – Category grouping of SKUs.
  • total_sales_units (numerical) – Units sold on a given day.
  • on_hand_inventory_units (numerical) – Units available in-store.
  • replenishment_units (numerical) – Units replenished onto shelves.
  • inventory_pipeline (numerical) – Units pending within the supply chain pipeline.
  • units_in_transit (numerical) – Units moving between DC and store.
  • units_in_dc (numerical) – Units currently available in distribution centers.
  • units_on_order (numerical) – Units ordered but not yet delivered.
  • units_under_promotion (numerical) – Units currently under promotional activities.
  • shelf_capacity (numerical) – Maximum units a shelf can hold for the SKU.

The dataset allows analysis across time (daily), location (store), and product (SKU/category) levels, supporting granular tracking of stock flows.

Data Preparation

Steps required:

1.Data Cleaning:

  • Handle missing values in sales, replenishment, or pipeline fields.
  • Remove duplicates and align date formatting.
  • Impute zero sales days carefully to distinguish true zero-demand from stockout-driven sales loss.

2.Feature Engineering:

  • Stockout flag: (on_hand_inventory_units = 0 AND sales > 0).
  • Shelf utilization ratio: total_sales_units ÷ shelf_capacity.
  • Replenishment efficiency: replenishment_units ÷ total_sales_units.
  • Inventory coverage days: on_hand_inventory_units ÷ avg_daily_sales.

3.Data Transformation:

  • Normalize continuous variables (sales, inventory, replenishment).
  • Encode categorical fields (store_id, sku, product_category).
  • Create rolling averages and lag features for time series forecasting.
